parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: When performing a paginated query, set the current page number. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description:
Set the unique identifier ID of the data object to be queried.

> You can obtain the identifier ID by calling [DescribeDataObjects](~~2399253~~).

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language type for requests and responses. Default value: **zh_cn**. Values:
- **zh_cn**: Chinese.
- **en_us**: English.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: When performing a paginated query, set the maximum number of data asset instances displayed per page. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: ProductId
parameters.description:
The ID corresponding to the product name of the data object. Values:
- **1**: MaxCompute
- **2**: OSS
- **3**: ADB-MYSQL
- **4**: TableStore
- **5**: RDS
- **6**: SELF_DB
- **7**: PolarDB-X
- **8**: PolarDB
- **9**: ADB-PG
- **10**: OceanBase
- **11**: MongoDB
- **25**: Redis

parameters.name: TemplateId
parameters.description:
Industry template ID.
> You can obtain the industry template identifier ID by calling [DescribeDataObjects](~~2399253~~).
